pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, September 5, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Edmonton, Alberta

11:15 a.m. The Prime Minister and Minister of Natural Resources Amarjeet Sohi will visit the Northern Alberta Institute of Technology’s Productivity and Innovation Centre to mark its opening. Remarks and a media availability will follow.

Productivity and Innovation Centre
Northern Alberta Institute of Technology
10210 Princess Elizabeth Avenue

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the visit
    • Open coverage of remarks and media availability
    • Media should arrive no later than 10:45 a.m.

Devon, Alberta

2:15 p.m. The Prime Minister and Minister of Natural Resources Amarjeet Sohi will tour CanmetENERGY’s Devon Research Centre.

Devon Research Centre
CanmetENERGY
1 Oil Patch Drive

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity
    • Media should arrive no later than 1:45 p.m.

Edmonton, Alberta

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Premier of Alberta Rachel Notley.

Jasper Room, Mezzanine Level
Fairmont Hotel Macdonald
10065 100th Street

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
    • Media should arrive via the main lobby no later than 3:30 p.m.

6:00 p.m. The Prime Minister and Minister of Natural Resources Amarjeet Sohi will visit the Bhartiya Cultural Society of Alberta.

Bhartiya Cultural Society of Alberta
9507 39 Avenue

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage
    • Media should arrive no later than 5:30 p.m.

Media appearances
8:45 a.m. A brief interview with the Prime Minister will air on 630 CHED Edmonton.
